faqs.question: How much do tattoos cost?
faqs.answer: Pricing varies based on size, complexity, and design type. Flash designs start at $150, custom designs start at $200. Contact me for a specific quote.

faqs.question: How long does a tattoo take?
faqs.answer: Duration depends on the design complexity. Simple designs take 1-2 hours, while detailed pieces can take 4-6 hours or more.

faqs.question: Do you do cover-ups?
faqs.answer: Yes, I specialize in cover-up work. Please bring reference photos and we can discuss the best approach during consultation.

faqs.question: What should I do to prepare for my appointment?
faqs.answer: Get a good night's sleep, eat a substantial meal beforehand, stay hydrated, and avoid alcohol 24 hours prior to your appointment.

faqs.question: Do you offer touch-ups?
faqs.answer: Yes, I provide one free touch-up within 6 months of the original tattoo, provided proper aftercare was followed.
